title: Customized hydrogel substrates for serum-free expansion of functional hMSCs

snippet:

title: Aspiration-assisted Freeform Bioprinting of Tissue Spheroids in a Yield-stress Gel
publication_info: B Ayan, Z Zhang, N Celik, K Zhou, Y Wu, F Costanzo… - bioRxiv, 2020 - biorxiv.org

(3D) arrangements has been a major obstacle for scaffold-free fabrication of tissues and 
organs. In this research, we unveiled a new approach to the bioprinting of tissue …

title: Investigating carrier-based methods and permeabilization strategies to efficiently deliver extracellular cargo into stem cells

title: The Influence of Vimentin Intermediate Filaments on Human Mesenchymal Stem Cell Response to Physical Stimuli
snippet:
Mesenchymal stem cells (MSCs) are increasingly being investigated as a therapeutic cell 
population for a variety of diseases. However, these therapies are limited by an imperfect 
understanding of how MSCs interact with and respond to their physical environment. Cell …
